channel.title: Cod on Cooking
channel.description: Recent content in Cod on Cooking

item.title: Sous Vide Frozen Cod
item.description: Sous Vide Frozen Cod Used the Joule to cook frozen cod fillets roughly 1.5 inched thick at 122 degrees for 1.5 hours. I actually want to try it at 131 degrees next time to make it even more flaky. I may just be used to over cooked fish though :)
